name: TorusRoad
description:
TORUS ROAD

Twin stick shooter about two friends lost in a mysterious ghostwood

— Keyboard —

W A S D - move
Mouse - aim
E - use / pick up  weapon
Q - switch weapons
Left Mouse Button - shoot
Right Mouse Button - grab a crate

ESC - pause game

— Xbox Controller —

Left Stick - moveRight Stick - aimRight Shoulder - use / pick up weapon / grab a crate
Left Shoulder - switch weapons
Right Trigger - shoot
Start Button - pause game
